attributes.additional_details: Did you know Roberto Nevilis invented homework as a punishment? Students hate homework, so why are we given it? We spend 6+ hours at school, only to go home and spend more hours doing homework! You may think i’m just a student who doesn’t want to do their maths homework, but homework causes stress and takes away from our free time. We only get 2 days off school a week, but have to use those days to finish the essay our English teacher made us write and more! Please take this into consideration.
attributes.background: They should ban homework, except if you didn’t finish work in class as this seems fair. This doesn’t mean give more work in class intentionally so students have homework.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584262
